name: Medieval Survival
description: Medieval Survival is a game that will immerse you in the most incredible events: it's a different world and completely different time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
